profile.selection.text1: Who is going to use the app on this device?
profile.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions

global.save_changes: Do you want to save your changes?

profile.what_do: What do you want to do?
profile.name: Name

onboarding2.title: Shortcuts on main screen
onboarding2.text: Customize according to your tastes and needs

onboarding1.title: Who is using OTTAA today?
onboarding1.text: With the profile selection you will be able to use OTTAA from any device, keeping your pictograms and styles!

onboarding3.title: We guide you in the learning process
onboarding3.text: Activate or deactivate boards and pictograms to enhance the prediction, you have control.

tips.text1: See the statistics of your patient / family member, to check their activity and how they improved over the days, weeks and months.
tips.text2: Hide boards the user does not need, so we only show what is important.
tips.text3: Use the history feature to see old sentences, what you did during the day, or tell stories.
tips.text4: Save pictograms and sentences in Favorites, so you can access them quickly.

signin.title: Log in with your account
signin.signup: Don't have an account yet? Sign up here

terms.text:
To continue we need you to accept the terms & conditions.
See terms & conditions

link.title: Enter the email of the account you want to link
link.text1: *Be sure you are in contact with the person using this email.
link.text2: *We are going to show you a token, input the token above.

token.title: Input the verification code that is shown in the screen of the account to link.
